resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/107950</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>107950</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770212436</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Teaching Hydrogeology in the 21st Century</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Unterrichtende Hydrogeologie im 21. Jahrhundert</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Hydrogéologie d'enseignement au 21ème siècle</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Hydrogeology ensinando no século XXI</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Hydrogeology d'istruzione nel ventunesimo secolo</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Υδρογεωλογία διδασκαλίας στο 21$ο αιώνα</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Hidrogeología de enseñanza en el siglo XXI</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This site from the "The On the Cutting Edge" workshop series features a wealth of ideas, teaching examples and web-based resources that are useful for teaching undergraduate hydrogeology.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Science and Technology</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Site von der Werkstattserie "der an 
Schneide" kennzeichnet eine Fülle von Ideen, Unterricht Beispiele und
Web-gegründete Betriebsmittel, die für das Unterrichten der 
Nichtgraduierthydrogeologie nützlich sind.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ce site "en fonction de la série d'atelier du 
tranchant" comporte une richesse des idées, exemples d'enseignement 
et ressources Web-basées qui sont utiles pour enseigner 
l'hydrogéologie d'étudiant préparant une licence.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Este local "da série da oficina sobre da borda de
corte" caracterizam uma riqueza das idéias, os exemplos do ensino e 
os recursos Web-baseados que são úteis para ensinar o hydrogeology 
do undergraduate.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questo luogo "dalla serie del gruppo di lavoro 
sopra del filo di lama" caratterizza una ricchezza delle idee, gli 
esempi di insegnamento e le risorse Web-basate che sono utili per 
l'istruzione del hydrogeology dello studente non laureato.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η περιοχή από τη σειρά εργαστηρίων "των επάνω 
τεμνουσών ακρών" χαρακτηρίζει έναν πλούτο των ιδεών, των 
παραδειγμάτων διδασκαλίας και των βασισμένων στο WEB στοιχείων 
συμπεριφοράς που είναι χρήσιμος για την προπτυχιακή υδρογεωλογία 
διδασκαλίας.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Este sitio de la serie del taller "encendido del 
filo" ofrece una abundancia de ideas, los ejemplos de la enseñanza y 
los recursos Web-basados que son útiles para enseñar la 
hidrogeología del estudiante.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wissenschaft und Technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La Science et technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciência e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienza e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Επιστήμη και τεχνολογία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencia y tecnología</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <lifeCycle>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>roleValues</source>
              <value>author</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD

          </contribute>
        </lifeCycle>

          <language>en</language>

        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>

        </educational>

            <value>yes</value>

        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>107950</entry>
